DOC.brief_summary: We develop 8-week Meaning-Centered Group Psychotherapy design help patient advance cancer sustain enhance sense meaning , peace purpose despite limitation cancer illness . This project 's overall aim explore feasibility efficacy new unique psychotherapy intervention advance cancer patient enhance psychological spiritual well-being quality life compare standard supportive group psychotherapy .
